column5: *It's quiet and serene, yet close to everything. 30 ft to golf course.  *Safe to walk in neighborhood or close by major nature trails *Awake to the aroma of coffee early every morning. Wine and cheese/fruit served frequently in evenings.  *Your room and full bath are very private, separated from Master Suite.  *Spacious, with queen bed, walk-in closet and reading area. *Updated kitchen with almost any gadget you would want. *Wifi, Fire Stick, TV *Kitchen, Living, Dining room available.
column8: YOU WILL LOVE THIS ONE - Serene and Safe.
